title: The Villainess Becomes a Commoner - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Gender Bender   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Male to Female   Modern Day   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Hiduki Shihou   緋月紫砲
description: After being killed, my next life is that of a rich family’s daughter who’s hated by the public!? Moreover, it’s several years in the future after I died, what’s with that? Besides, I don’t have any idea about the female lifestyle. I was a man, alright? I’m hesitant about living life in her place. But living like she would will only lead to ruin and I’m not into that. In that case, there shouldn’t be any problems with me living her life the way I want now, should there? Involving both the past and the present, the curtain rises for the chaotic struggles of the replaced young lady.>
